name: Basic Birthday Bash
description: A simple yet delightful celebration featuring colorful balloon decorations, cake options, and party favors. Let our coordinator handle the details for a hassle-free experience.
advantages: Colorful balloon decorations to brighten the party atmosphere
Delicious cake with a variety of flavors to choose from
Party favors including hats, noisemakers, and goody bags for all guests
Skilled party coordinator to ensure a hassle-free celebration

name: Princess Party Extravaganza
description: Transform your child into royalty with princess-themed decorations, character appearances, and enchanting activities like wand crafting.

Professional princess character appearance for photos and storytelling
Magical entertainment and games like wand crafting and tiara making
Personalized princess-themed invitations for your guests

name: Superhero Adventure

Custom superhero masks for all partygoers

advantages: Hip decorations and atmospheric lighting to set the mood

advantages: Beautiful garden setup with fairy lights and floral arrangements

Live acoustic music to create a soothing ambiance

Prizes for all guests to take home as souvenirs
